Package ru.nsu.meshcheryakova

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.meshcheryakova.App
  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the application. The application downloads the repositories of the students specified in the config, starts the compilation process, generates documentation, runs tests and checks the code style. The results are in the file 'src/main/resources/report.html'.
